content:
Yes, definitely. Many restaurants and bars in Graz offer vegan and vegetarian options on their menus. Here are some recommendations that have options for your group:

1. Cafe Mitte - This trendy cafe in the heart of the city serves a range of vegan and vegetarian options, including salads, sandwiches, and smoothies.

2. BioBox - This health food store and cafe has a wide selection of vegan and vegetarian food and drink options, including smoothies, wraps, and salads.

3. Cafe Erde - This cozy vegetarian cafe has a great selection of homemade vegetarian and vegan dishes, including soups, stews, and pastries.

4. Tribeka - This popular cafe and bar has a range of vegan and vegetarian food options, including salads and sandwiches, as well as vegan baked goods.

5. Cafe Sacher - This iconic cafe in the city center is known for its famous Sacher Torte, but also offers several vegan and vegetarian options, such as salads and vegetable quiches.

I hope this helps and that everyone in your group can find something they enjoy!
